entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump What I can’t believe is that you think this is top of mind for Americans. Or that you believe we are so impressionable that “Statuegate” will deflect from the things that really matter: #PutinsBounty #CoronavirusPandemic #PoliceBrutality #SystemicRacism We’ve not lost our focus.
